document.full_text: iraq's army and police went on high alert on monday for possible revenge attacks in one of al qaeda's major battlegrounds after u.s. forces killed osama bin laden in a raid on his pakistan hideout.
document.title: iraq steps up security after bin laden killing
lines_and_colors: iraq's army and police went on high alert on monday for possible revenge attacks in one of al qaeda's major battlegrounds after u.s. forces killed osama bin laden in a raid on his pakistan hideout.
